title: Won't be able to get Mark of Star guardian icon?
body: I took the quiz and was awaiting eagerly to realize that I didn't get the icon for awhile. I realized I took the quiz after the 20th but the quiz said I was able to get the screen that said I could redeem it when I compleyed the quiz. So am I not able to get the icon because it was after 20th? I was so excited ToT

replies.body:
It can take *up to a week* to get the Icon after taking the quiz. Sit tight and you should have it soon.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
